tool.name: ImportExternalRangeReview

param.name: range_map_id
param.dialogReference: RangeMapID of the record to be deleted

param.name: external_range_table
param.dialogReference: Table containing the EcoshapeIDs that constitute the results of the external review
param.pythonReference: Table containing the EcoshapeIDs that constitute the results of the external review

param.name: presence_field
param.dialogReference: Name of the field in the External Range Table containing the reviewed Presence value for the Ecoshape; either the Presence Field or the UsageType Field must be provided; if not provided, Presence will not be impacted by the import
param.pythonReference: Name of the field in the External Range Table containing the reviewed Presence value for the Ecoshape; either the Presence Field or the UsageType Field must be provided; if not provided, Presence will not be impacted by the import

param.name: usagetype_field
param.dialogReference: Name of the field in the External Range Table containing the reviewed UsageType value for the Ecoshape; either the Presence Field or the UsageType Field must be provided; if not provided, UsageType will not be impacted by the import
param.pythonReference: Name of the field in the External Range Table containing the reviewed UsageType value for the Ecoshape; either the Presence Field or the UsageType Field must be provided; if not provided, UsageType will not be impacted by the import

param.name: review_label
param.dialogReference: A descriptive label to be recorded with the review records
param.pythonReference: A descriptive label to be recorded with the review records

param.name: overall_review_notes
param.pythonReference: Additional text to be stored in Review.ReviewNotes

param.name: jurisdictions_covered
param.dialogReference: One or more jurisdictions indicating the extent of the external review (only ecoshapes within the selected jurisdictions(s) will be marked up in the review)
param.pythonReference: One or more jurisdictions indicating the extent of the external review (only ecoshapes within the selected jurisdictions(s) will be marked up in the review)

param.name: username
param.dialogReference: The username of the Expert who completed the external review (must exist in Expert table)
param.pythonReference: The username of the Expert who completed the external review (must exist in Expert table)

param.name: additions_only
param.dialogReference: When checked, does not process ecoshape removals or changes
param.pythonReference: When checked, does not process ecoshape removals or changes

tool.summary: Create review records for an existing range map based on third-party polygons
